name: Credential Dumping to ADMIN localhost
description: Detects the credential dumping, creating a dump in the ADMIN tmp.
search: index=* source="WinEventLog:*" AND ((Image="*\\cmd.exe" OR OriginalFileName="cmd.exe") AND CommandLine="*/c wmic process call create*" AND (CommandLine="*\\"cmd.exe /c mkdir C:\\Windows\\Temp\\tmp*\" OR CommandLine="*& ntdsutil \\\"ac i ntds\\\" ifm \\\"create full C:\\Windows\\Temp\\tmp\\\" 1> \\127.0.0.1\\ADMIN$\\ 2>&1*"))
